pageSubtitle: Explore my journey through my projects, certifications, and technical expertise.
pageDescription: Each section represents a milestone in my continuous learning path.

projects.title: AutoForge - Multi-Agent AI Automation SaaS Platform
projects.description: From idea to web app in 2 hours. 4 specialized AI agents transform your description into a fully tested, deployed, and production-ready application. Strategic migration Vertex AI → Claude SDK: -55% costs, -28% latency.
features: 4-phase automated pipeline: PO Agent → Tech Lead → Executor → QA
Multi-agent orchestration via Claude SDK + in-process MCP (zero latency)
Technical migration Vertex AI → Claude: -55% costs, -28% latency, -80% errors
Isolated VMs per project (Spot VMs with automatic preemption handling)
Real-time WebSocket logs + Live Preview iframe
Complete export: ZIP, GitHub push, or Cloud Run deployment
Time-to-Market: <2h from idea to production-ready MVP
Scalable serverless architecture (Cloud Run + Firestore)

projects.title: Mimo Finance - Collaborative Financial Management App
projects.description: Modern web application for personal and couple financial management with unified timeline, automatic projections, and couple mode. Deployed on GCP Cloud Run with complete Terraform infrastructure.
features: Continuous financial timeline (past → present → future over 12 months)
Couple mode with 3 tracked wallets + merge/split functionality
Automatic projections for recurring transactions
Automatic daily validation via Cloud Scheduler
Complete GCP infrastructure (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Redis, VPC)
CI/CD with GitHub Actions (tests, SonarCloud, automatic deployment)
Terraform IaC for total reproducibility
Unit + integration tests with 85%+ coverage

projects.title: Multi-Cloud Portfolio Infrastructure
projects.description: Portfolio deployed on AWS ECS and GCP Cloud Run with Terraform for IaC
features: Multi-cloud deployment (AWS ECS Fargate + GCP Cloud Run)
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform (reusable modules)
Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions
Container Registry (AWS ECR + GCP Artifact Registry)
Lifecycle policies for cost optimization (~$15/month)
Serverless architecture with scale-to-zero

projects.title: AI TikTok Video Pipeline - Automated Generation
projects.description: Complete pipeline for automatic generation of viral TikTok/Shorts videos from a simple theme. Uses Gemini 2.5 Pro, Veo 3.0, Google TTS Premium, and Whisper.
features: AI script generation with Gemini 2.5 Pro
Premium voice-over (natural Gemini voice via Google TTS)
Creative video clips generated by Veo 3.0 (best AI video model)
TikTok-style synchronized subtitles (Whisper + ASS)
Optimized 9:16 format, 64-80 seconds duration
Fully automated pipeline: 1 theme → complete video in 6-10 min
4 Cloud Functions triggered in cascade via Cloud Storage Events
Parallel generation of 8 video clips for optimization
